title.narrative: 2019 Project - KISUA African Fashion Supply Chain and Trade Capacity Development

description.narrative: Scale the production of the company’s pan-African supply chain to more countries across the content, from supply of cotton from farms, to yarn, fabric and garment production in Africa for local and international consumption. We are targeting 100 SME’s in the African fashion supply chain for evaluation with a view to immediately adding 25 new African suppliers to our database and creating 1000 jobs and job opportunities in the next 12 months.
